# dateTime

**Instance Property**

The value to use when performing date-based searches.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var dateTime: INDateComponentsRange? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent/dateSearchType] property to determine how to apply the specified date to your search criteria.

## Searching by Date

- **dateSearchType**: An indicator of how to apply date values to your search.
- **INDateSearchType**: Constants indicating the type of date-based search to perform.
